thread.section_title: St. James' Court, A Taj Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Convenient and Very Nice Hotel
thread.title_full: Convenient and Very Nice Hotel - Review of St. James' Court, A Taj Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Sylvia B
title: Convenient and Very Nice Hotel
text: Hotel was very nice, located in a great area with easy walk to everything. Room was a good size by US standards with frig, large bathroom, sitting area and nice windows overlooking courtyard. Only complaint would be need for more outlets to charge mobile devices.
